content: Move on to Step 4 of implementing the features of this web-based commercial appraisal report writing application, continuing to assume everything I previously instructed you to assume, and now help me with the calculation tools: The application should include tools for calculating key metrics, such as the value of the property, the cost approach, and the sales comparison approach. These tools should be based on industry-standard methods and should be customizable based on the user's preferences.
